_header: Tidings I bring for you for to tell
_description: A Boar’s Head song — two irregular 9-line stanzas (aaabccddb)

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
Tydynges I bryng ȝow for to tellWhat me in wyld forest be
                    fell…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…I pray ȝow to be glad euerychon& Ioy all in
                    one
